\subsection{Detailed Description}
Handle Semi\-One dimensional partitioning model. This module implements the routines to handle Semi-\/\-One\-D dimensional partitioning model.

Called by \hyperlink{poski__PartitionHandler_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Partition\-Handler.\-c}
